duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect completed products and perform routine equipment maintenance.
Disassemble, troubleshoot, repair, reassemble, and test various types of equipment.
Prepare jobs according to instructions and perform inspection of completed products in adherence to quality standards.
Load and unload delivery vehicles, arrange products according to assigned deliveries, and transport rental/sales orders in designated vehicles.
Ensure proper maintenance of delivery vehicle and report all accidents/damage/malfunctions.
